website_summaries.verdict: This polo offers a stellar value for an athletic polo that wicks moisture, looks great, and is comfortable.
pros: Available in a multitude of vibrant colors
Shirt has smooth and silky finish that doesn’t diminish in quality, no matter how many times it’s washed
Moisture-wicking fabric does not give off odor, even if you’ve sweat in the shirt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shirt for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are great. Lightweight, breathes well, and has outstanding comfort. They don't shrink much after washing either. I bought several of them because of their outstanding fit. I recommended them to a guy at work and he bought 4. They fit great and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. Size large. He is 6'0" and 225lb. He looks really nice in it, and I love it on him! Only gave 4 stars though because he doesn't love the fabric. He doesn't hate it. It's just not as comfortable as some of his other shirts. But still happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Low maintenance
customer_reviews.text: This Polo fits as Perfect, i am 5'11 and 220 lbs and I bought a Large. Its lightweight and cool, which is a plus in humidity. It is also very low maintenance. Toss it in the wash, toss it in the dryer, hang it in the closet or toss it in the pile of unfolded laundry that is forever collecting on the couch in your living room, piling higher and higher and seeming never ending. You could take some time to fold it and be rid of that pile but first you'll have quick look on social media...oh its bed time, guess ill get to that laundry tomorrow. Anyway when you pull this shirt out of the pile...NO WRINKLES!.
customer_reviews.author: Meval

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt but no XX-Larges
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first, an XX-Large, red striped shirt, a week ago. It's great. But I went back to buy a few more and no XX-large size shirts are available now in any color. This is an Amazon Essentials item and they can't keep them in stock? Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Great shirts. Truly love the value and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great shirts. Obviously they are not extremely high end but most luxury brands aren’t either. All coming from same places. I love the options and prices Amazon has. I have around 4 of these shirts and they are my go to polos for golf. They have a moisture wi king property but don’t feel or look like some of the fabrics in moisture wicking shirts so you can wear them anywhere. I anticipate I will buy many more shirts from Amazon. Obviously they won’t last forever but they are a bargain and hard to beat anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Phillycheese

customer_reviews.title: Size M fits like a L
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10", 165 lbs and usually am in between a M and an L in shirts. Large shirts are usually a bit baggy on me and M's can be tight and the sleeves short. I usually got with an M but I know exactly how each fit looks on me. This shirt is a size M but fits like a Large, maybe even a bit bigger. Returning it and will try a Small. It looked pretty wrinkled from the shipping, so I'm guessing it's not really wrinkle-free. It felt like a slightly cheap golf shirt -- the fabric felt silky and cool, but slightly rough. Color and pattern looked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a tall husky kid
customer_reviews.text: Great for for my child who loves purple. Has been through the wash a couple of times and no issues. He says it’s comfortable and being a little nicer than graphic art his t-shirts he’s quite happy with this short.
customer_reviews.author: badjenetix

customer_reviews.title: Runs quite large.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium, though I usually order large shirts. Well, the medium is quite large, but I can wear it. I ordered a second one in Small, knowing that I have nothing Small in my closet since high school. Shipping was supposed to be on 7/5, then delayed til 7/6, by 8pm, then showed up at 9:30pm with no call or text from the delivery. So it sat in a common area for a while. No big deal, I guess. A shirt is not an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Professor59

customer_reviews.title: Don’t head to golf course without these shirts
customer_reviews.text: Warm weather( Florida) golf shirt(s) nice fit, especially shoulders and sleeve length. Slim fit returned for regular fit. I’m 5’9” 165 lbs and 34” waist and this breathable quick dry regular fit large is ideal. Looks great, launders perfectly and an amazing price. Think I’m up to 7-8 shirsts in this series.
customer_reviews.author: E.penname

customer_reviews.title: Great shirts, comfortable and half the price
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are really good and the price is unbeatable. I have IZOD, Ralph Lauren, and Lacoste. I feel that the Ralph Lauren are more comfortable than these Amazon ones but not by much. Lacoste is such a waste of money, they are sometimes upwards of $50 and not as comfortable as the Amazon essentials brand. You cannot go wrong with these because if you don't like them...you only spent $12. They are my go to for polo shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Dirty

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: I have recently lost my weight that I always said I would. (My Fitness Pal) I ordered two polo shirts in L. I like the quick dry feature the shirt offer. They (Red/White pin stripe) (White/black pin stripe) are nice looking and will work out well while I am trying to retrieve my golf ball out of the lake! These shirt were made exclusively for Amazon. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wellington Steeler Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, looks good and keeps you cool
customer_reviews.text: These are great shirts. I have them in 4 different colors for my husband. Even though he works in a 85-90 degree environment he is still expected to look semi professional so these shirts are a great option for keeping him looking great and keep him cool at the same time. He usually wears an L/XL in t shirts depending on how tight they are in the arms and the L in these fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt for the price. A little thin but that’s fine for my husband who works outside in this hot, humid SC weather :) I bought two shirts, would buy again. Washed on cold and hung up to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly stechmesser

customer_reviews.title: A relaxed fit, quality shirt
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this amazon basics shirt, but after wearing them a few times, I've come to really enjoy them. The sizing is a bit larger than what I would have expected, but they are not too large. I ordered a large and they fit my frame well, but with some added length to cover my belt line. The material is soft, wicking, and dries quickly. I would recommend these shirts to anyone in need of a good everyday polo.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Dean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these shirts very much. I purchased 2 for him the other one is aqua. They fit great, he wears a large. He said they’re very comfortable to golf in. They wash and dry perfectly with no wrinkles at all. Great price @ 15.00 each. I’ve bought a few amazon essentials and have pleased with them all. The colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt, but color darker than in photo
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shirt. A little on the big side, but the color was different from the picture. It's much darker, almost straight orange, in person. Returned it for another color.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise. I thought I was just getting a cheap shirt to tide me over while I'm temporarily sketched out about shopping in public, but ended up being nice, breathable fabric to wear while everything seems 30 degrees hotter than it really is because I have to wear masks all the time for work.
customer_reviews.author: Juicebox42

customer_reviews.title: High quality shirt at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The quality is better than I expected. I bought this for my husband, and he loves it. The material is soft but feels like it’s high-quality. The color is exactly as it appeared in the picture and looks nice and bold. He wears an XL and it fit exactly as his other shirts do. I’ll end up buying him another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Teri S

customer_reviews.title: Nice Polo
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a really nice looking and feeling shirt. Their "regular fit" is more of a generous cut. It's not an athletic style pattern at all, but it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: decent shirt
customer_reviews.text: its not ultra high quality, but it's not a cheap thing that fall's apart in 3 washes either. I use these for work in an environment that requires business casual dress but is in an outdoor environment. These hold up well, and for the price I don't feel bad if one gets damaged.
customer_reviews.author: rothchilds

customer_reviews.title: comfort for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these. I have the typical dad bod, with a little more in the middle than I want to carry. Alas, these 2XLs fit well enough and are comforatble. For ~$15, you'd be hard-pressed to find similar pricing (unless on special) in a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I ever bought on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered 6 shirts using Amazon Wardrobe but fell in love with them immediately. So it was a no brainier to buy them. I immediately bought 4 more. I love the over sized fit, not snug. Very light, breathable fabric, perfect for the hot, humid days we have had. Washed several times and they come out perfectly. One of the best things I ever bought on Amazon! I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: cminchik

customer_reviews.title: Too big, but quality
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty light weight, soft nit (but not SUPER soft), quality seems..... just too big. Definitely order down a size. It works "ok" if worn with pants that are baggy (I wear baggy Dickies to work because of the moving/lifting). With fitted or normal pants... the shirt will look like a balloon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Voo.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is wacky and not good
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium. The body is medium, the rest is not. The collar/head opening is enormous. The sleeves are gigantic. This is obviously cutting corners by using the same pattern for multiple sizes of garment and only changing a few seams to make it "Medium." Terrible, I will never buy another "Amazon essential." I can't wear this shirt, the fit is wacky.
customer_reviews.author: charles quintas

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY COOL AND COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Love these shirts. They fit a little big, however, so take that into consideration when ordering. I wear a medium but in this a small fits me better. Extremely comfortable and cool. They’re running out of sizes for this summer though. I have six of them already and would like to purchase a few more but I guess they have sold quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ArchieG

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cool
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shirts so much, I bought him 3 colors in this shirt. He was working out of town for months and these are so easy to throw in the washer and dryer and come out looking great, no crinkled collars. Keeps him cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Appearance and quality are good.. I wear polos all spring, summer and fall so having $15 options on Amazon is wonderful. The best way to have your clothes last is to rotate and own lots. I own about 50 shirts like this and they’ll last for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Peters

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt, I will be getting more. It is not 100% cotton so it won't shrink and it is true to size. It is a tiny bit longer than I expected, but that's perfect for "business casual" days when you would need to tuck in the shirt. It doesn't look too long either when it is untucked, but to each their own. I'm a short guy with broad shoulders and shirts like this are rough to find, they are either too short or too long, too baggy or too tight, but this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Nice, affordable shirts!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got the aqua and coral stripe shirts. The material is breathable and they fit true to size. The only reason they don’t get 5 stars is because of the color discrepancy between what is shown online vs reality. The aqua was lighter and brighter than advertised, & the coral stripe appeared almost orange instead of coral.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: All around great product and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love the golf polo shirts I have about 20 different colors and brands, they are breathable and lite weight. They do not wrinkle. They do not shrink when they are put into the dryer. Totally recommend this Amazon basic brand for the golf shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Arizmendi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and can't beat the price for great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shirts, I ordered this black/white striped one and a pale blue one. The material is just as described and keeps him cool. The size large fit him great and washing/drying is really easy with no shrinkage or wrinkles. Liked so much I ordered two more which arrived today in different colors which I also appreciate the many color choices!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Light Summer Polo
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'5" and appreciate clothes that fit. I also appreciate cool shirts in hot summers that don't wrinkle and look good. These shirts tick all those boxes. I bought 6 of them and they are my go to shirts this summer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Waldrup

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. I got them for work. Easy to clean, no need to iron them. Nice color and comfortable. Very happy with product..:)))
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lutan

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with exception to sleeve fit
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with all features of the shirt with exception to the arm sleeve fit while golfing, The shirt sleeves tended to restrain my arm movement while golfing, I prefer a loose fitting shirt sleeve. Very satisfied with all other features of the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the soft feel. The length is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I was sure what to expect but I love this shirt. I have more expensive quick dry polo shirts and this one is just as good. It fits and feel great on hot muggy days. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shirts
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me 4 of these for my birthday...she knows firsthand how much I sweat. They are awesome...lightweight, breathable, don't hold moisture, and great looking. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Better Buy It Before It's Gone.
customer_reviews.text: Feels Great! Looks Great! Great Price! Others asking where I got it. Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very good, not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. The red with white stripes is good to go after 3 washes. The light green with white strips seems to be having issues. I can not iron the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: NSB45

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for muscular body type
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’10”, muscular build and I typically have problems with shirts being to tight around my shoulders, bicep, and arm pit area, but these fit great! Also enough slack to tuck in. Shirts feel light, breathable, and durable. Highly recommend for golf or work casual shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Clark

customer_reviews.title: great shirt especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for Dri Fit shirts and found this...boyfriend said it was pretty good for golf but not as moisture wicking as the actual Nike Dri Ft shirts. Good quality for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Nice colorful well made shirt
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bright orange striped shirt. Will last and not shrink Yah!
customer_reviews.author: keri Banister

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, nice bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt. Wrinkle free. Soft polyester blend fabric with just enough stretch for comfort. I've already ordered a second one and will definitely stock up!
customer_reviews.author: A. Touchstone

customer_reviews.title: Very decent budget shirt
customer_reviews.text: If you need cheap but decent looking shirts that aren't sweatboxes, these are it. Doesn't feel like you're wearing plastic bottles, looks good, dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: I Like Zombies

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these shirts. A medium in the slim fit and a small in the regular fit. They appear to be the exact same size. They both fit me well. I would purchase either again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is roomy without being too large and it wicks away the moisture, which is important here in South Florida in the summer. I play golf 5 days a week and these shirts provide affordable and stylish tops for me.
customer_reviews.author: JiminFla.

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought both a blue and a red. The Blue fit perfectly. The red (which was the same tag size) was too small. So disappointing. Unreliable sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Grams

customer_reviews.title: The fits was poor, way too long.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shirt, way too long. This didn’t fit like a regular large, it was about two-three inches longer then other large golf/polo shirts in my closet, I gave it away to one of my tall friends (6’ 3” guy), it looks okay on him.
customer_reviews.author: Dan  - West Chester, PA

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt, excellent value. Told my golf buddies I got it for $15 and they were impressed. Washed it a couple times and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mark

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these the other day and just bought two more; for $15 these shirts exceed expectations. I wouldn't put them against great golf polos from Nike or Callaway but at a fraction of the price I don't need to.
customer_reviews.author: PGD

customer_reviews.title: He bought a bunch
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked the fit & feel so much he went back and bought more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect high quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is very good for the price. Don’t expect high quality fabric when it arrives. However I notice it feels a bit big and not well fitted for my body type. On the plus side it looks fine when it’s on and Doesn’t interfere with my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Neff

customer_reviews.title: Colors muted, no life after several washing
customer_reviews.text: Shirts are well crafted, but look much older than they are after a few washings. Collars starting to curl. I suppose for the price they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: comfy but a bit swimmy
customer_reviews.text: this is my new golf shirt it is a bit big and I feel like i am swimming in it a bit but not enough not to like it I will wear it alot
customer_reviews.author: p w

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves the shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. Definitely buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Eagan-Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality for the price! Wash well and look real nice. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My picky dad loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad to play golf in for Father’s Day. He is the pickiest guy on earth and LOVES these shirts and they look great on him. High quality and great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics does it again
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt for the price. I have only had it for a couple of weeks so we will see how well it holds up. I wear these kind of polos for work all the time so it will definitely get some use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit
customer_reviews.text: The shirt fit as expected. I don't like a tight fit, this fit just the way I like it. It did not shrink after washing and seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Could have gone a size down. Am normally a 2x T-shirt, and a XL Polo. Ordered a 2XL based on the reviews and wish I had not.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: the shirt is comfortable and well made. I like the product and will be purchasing more clothes from Amazon basics.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Good color, fit well as expected no wrinkle after wash and does not need ironing.will buy more of different colors
customer_reviews.author: Samuel V.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite Polo shirt
customer_reviews.text: I got the orange and black with white stripes ones and love them both. Material is breathable and easy to wash. Does not shrink and color stays the same.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRE GARNEAU

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt
customer_reviews.text: Out of the wrapper it fits well, washes without shrinking and seems like a decent quality. Time will tell, but initial impressions are favorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T Nemec

customer_reviews.title: Ok shirt, sizing not right for large athletic build
customer_reviews.text: I did return this shirt as it was a bit short and small. Not a terrible shirt but I think better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size smaller because the small didn’t fit me at all. I always where a small and this small wasn’t even close unfortunately. I felt the material was going to be really nice though.
customer_reviews.author: pendulum

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: This $15 polo shirt is exactly what I am looking for as travel casual. First, this shirt can be roll up in your luggage and not get wrinkle. I use to wash it in the hotel room at night and it get dry in the morning (about 8 hrs). The shirt feel cool when you put on and will dry your sweat fairly quickly. Very good for warm and hot weather region travel.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these shirts!
customer_reviews.text: These shirts fit my husband perfectly! He’s not a clothes guy but he does love these shirts. I bought several colors for him. Seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pottery Queen

customer_reviews.title: I’m shrinking.
customer_reviews.text: In a weight watchers transition so very glad to have this good if a golf shirt as I move from XL to L.
customer_reviews.author: JayBo

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: A really fine shirt, especially for the price. Color is attractive and texture of material feels high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt. Can’t beat it for price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this shirt. I have only worn it once, so time will tell about its longevity. It was definitely worth the price though. 4 stars for slightly disliking the fabric’s feel.
customer_reviews.author: J Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it Wore it all weekend.
customer_reviews.text: Like the color. He likes the gift for Easter. Fits a little roomy, but very comfortable he says.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a large or medium. This is more on XL size of large like the others stated. Nice color and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kummer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Ones of the best shirts you can buy for the price. Excellent fit and no wrinkle look. I will buy many more.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was generously sized as expected. It dose appear thinner than other similar polo shirts i have of this type. I have not worn it outside to evaluate the moisture wicking properties.
customer_reviews.author: RB Sr

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: It says "medium", but it was made for an elephant.
customer_reviews.author: Usleo71

customer_reviews.title: Solid shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, feel, and style. Paid $15 and feel like I got a high quality shirt for the value. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jozsa

customer_reviews.title: Washes great
customer_reviews.text: Feel very nice and wears well, it keeps it shape and doesn’t shrink and loose shape like cotton. The price is very Good
customer_reviews.author: Leo Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are fantastic. Wash and Wear!! I've ordered 4 for my husband. All different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: . Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product before and have never been disappointed. Very comfortable aware and easy to clean. Never a wrinkle. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Colorful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shirt for my son. He does not like his clothes "clingy" and this shirt fit him just perfect without looking sloppy or too loose for him. He really likes this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanee Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great price
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shirts for work and social Sometimes i wear 2XL but the XL perfect
customer_reviews.author: James Boyle

customer_reviews.title: I love these shirts
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase this shirt in several colors/designs. Low price, great fit, long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L. Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Really good value
customer_reviews.text: These shirts seem to be well made of comfortable material. Time will tell, but I think they will hold up. The one drawback I see is the tail is a little short. If you are over 6 ft. You may want a “tall” if it is offered.
customer_reviews.author: gray hackle

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: First time purchased Amazon basic clothing, being a customer since 2012. The T-shirt Not that great. Just Okay.
customer_reviews.author: NS1986

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shirts. I’ve bought him several. They fit perfectly and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not soft fabric but doesn’t wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for $10. Fabric is not soft at all but it doesn’t wrinkle which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the larger than normal side. Polyester ... Meh. An okay shirt for fifteen bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Namjodh Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: The po;o is very light weight and fits very well. A real bargain for the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, worse quality
customer_reviews.text: I think someone repurposed the kitchen hand towels to make these shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great polo, not wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: Only disappointment was that this polo is definitely not wrinkle free like most other golf shirts. Other than that the shirt is soft, comfy and modern. Fit as expected, plenty of room in my medium, classic fit. This is not a medium trying to be a small if you get my drift.
customer_reviews.author: JR Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shirt! It is a little short in the back, so I do have to tuck it in often.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Meh. 2 to 3 stars. Fabric is not performance.
customer_reviews.text: This is not performance fabric. Washed and hung shirt before I wore it. Still shows wrinkles. It’s a solid 2 to 3 star. The price was good, but won’t get more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and polo. This is my second one and I’m ordering other colors.
customer_reviews.author: JFF3

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Essential shirts
customer_reviews.text: This is the first of four Amazon essentials shirts that I have bought. All are great.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Bottoms

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and feels very soft on the skin. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: jbh

customer_reviews.title: Will reorder
customer_reviews.text: Great color and great fit. My boyfriend loves to wear this golfing! May order more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to polo shirt
customer_reviews.text: Nice relaxed fit, nice texture, nice price. I had complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, nice material and washes well. My husband wears these polos frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Paige O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great material for the summer heat
customer_reviews.text: Great in the az heat. Breathes good. Colors are bright. Price is right
customer_reviews.author: KEITH COBB

product_meta.title: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-fit Quick-Dry Golf Polo Shirt
product_meta.description: An Amazon brand - This regular-fit golf polo shirt is crafted from a quick-dry moisture-wicking knit and features three button placket and open-bottom hem
feature_bullets: This regular-fit golf polo shirt is crafted from a quick-dry moisture-wicking knit and features three button placket and open-bottom hem
Lightweight performance quick-dry fabric wicks moisture to help keep you dry and provides UPF sun protection ranging from UPF 20 – UPF 40 depending on color selected*
Everyday made better: we listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort
Model is 6'2" and wearing size Medium
